channel.title: M96 Rifle <Updated>
channel.description:
Welp, you might have seen my other thread for my rifle WIP...Here it is completed with textures UV mapped onto it...
[size=18pt]Basic Renders[/size] [URL=http://img33.imageshack.us/i/m96finished.png/][IMG]http://img33.imageshack.us/img33/9217/m96finished.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img443.imageshack.us/i/m96finished3.png/][IMG]http://img443.imageshack.us/img443/3999/m96finished3.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img175.imageshack.us/i/m96finished2.png/][IMG]http://img175.imageshack.us/img175/5912/m96finished2.png[/img][/URL]
[size=18pt]Advanced Renders[/size] [URL=http://img153.imageshack.us/i/m96photoreal.jpg/][IMG]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/5512/m96photoreal.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img101.imageshack.us/i/m96rifle.jpg/][IMG]http://img101.imageshack.us/img101/1194/m96rifle.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img146.imageshack.us/i/m96photoreal2.jpg/][IMG]http://img146.imageshack.us/img146/3188/m96photoreal2.jpg[/img][/URL]
All of this was made in C4D, advanced renders rendered with Vray

item.title: M96 Rifle <Updated>
item.dc:creator: @Tribbinator Tribbinator
item.description:
@Tribbinator wrote:

Well Kihomura, first, I thank you for taking the time to look at my thread…The only other gun ive ever made, was when I was starting C4D, and its not nearly as good as this…This is probably my best piece of work ever…sorry!

Read full topic

item.title: M96 Rifle <Updated>
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Tribbinator:

Haha, thanks…I found myself to be even better at modelling in 3ds max 11, because of the tools they have that C4D doesnt…but im still having problems with normal mapping…so youve got me beat there :S

Meh, normal mapping sucks anyway, only useful if you’re going into the games industry.
I’m still using 3ds max 9.

Read full topic

item.title: M96 Rifle <Updated>
item.dc:creator: @Tribbinator Tribbinator
item.description:
@Tribbinator wrote:

Or extrude / bevel method I use…Almost everything in this gun is a cube primitive with hardly any preset cuts in the primitive…Pics time…

Step one…make primitive

Step two…select edges to extrude of said primitive

Step three…use extrude and extrude to here

Step four…use extrude and extrude to here then scale

Step five…keep extruding and scaling, then add details with knife / loopcut

Step six…

Step seven…DONT STEAL MY WIP

Read full topic

item.title: M96 Rifle <Updated>
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

SilentCJ:

Just get a cube, make a few cuts and then move around the vertices in each of the vertices to fit the reference, it’s not hard.

You mean, like make a cube, get a reference picture, then knife-tool-cut(?) the faces then just manipulate the faces to look like the picture?

Read full topic

item.title: M96 Rifle <Updated>
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Just get a cube, make a few cuts and then move around the vertices in each of the vertices to fit the reference, it’s not hard.

Read full topic

item.title: M96 Rifle <Updated>
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:23, topic:349558”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=445932.msg3275531#msg3275531 date=1279506726]

Not going to lock this, but if you have any models - not pertaining to RuneScape in particular - please post them over on Moparisthebest. (if I’m wrong, could Frell or SilentCJ please tell me so? This is more your guys’ section than anyone else’s. :P)

CJ stated on an older topic he wouldn’t lock anything that isn’t rs2 related
[/quote]Lol, I’m trying to search for one of his posts, actually. He said that he wouldn’t lock any non-rs models here because he’d rather see high-quality work than shitty recolors.[/quote]

Mmm, but if high quality work appears frequently in the section from the same user, I will ask them to post it in the graphics section.
For your own good anyway, you get a hell of a lot better criticism over there, trust me.

I mean it’s not like I post all my 3ds max work here.

Read full topic
